p:
Table 4 lists the basic reproduction number computed with the baseline parameters. For this case, the
R 0
of DENV (ZIKV, or CHIKV) transmitted by Wolbachia-free mosquitoes is the highest, followed by
R 0
of DENV (ZIKV, or CHIKV) transmitted by mosquitoes infected with wAlbB strain of Wolbachia, and
R 0
for mosquitoes carrying wMel strain is the smallest. The basic reproduction number for ZIKV is the largest in all cases. The basic reproduction number of DENV is greater than the basic reproduction number of CHIKV for mosquitoes carrying the same strain of Wolbachia or Wolbachia-free mosquitoes.
